body: Hi all, I am trying to modify an example file I found at this post:   [http://www.grasshopper3d.com/photo/form-finding-octopus-ladybug?xg_...](http://www.grasshopper3d.com/photo/form-finding-octopus-ladybug?xg_source=activity) but I get this error: **1. Solution exception:name 'bold_' is not defined** I check both Chirs' and Mostapha's sun-path tutorials on YouTube, but no input data is missing so far. Do the components get outdated when I open an old file? Many thanks for any insight.
